strings.name: character-limit-exceeded-warning-message
strings.description: Message describing the effects of exceeding the character limit
strings.en_us: Character limit exceeded: A character will be abandoned, with its spark permanently added to your total.

strings.name: combined-limit-warning-message
strings.description: Message describing the effects of exceeding both the character limit and the hand size limit
strings.en_us: Character limit exceeded: A character will be abandoned. Cards drawn in excess of 10 become {e} instead.

test_cards.rules_text_en_us: {Prevent} a played enemy event unless the enemy pays {-energy-cost(e: 2)}.
Pay one or more {e}: Draw {-cards(n: 1)} for each {e} spent.
Whenever you play a card during the enemy's turn, this character gains {-gained-spark(n:1)}.

test_cards.name_en_us: Test Return One Or Two Void Events
test_cards.rules_text_en_us: Return one or two events from your void to your hand.

test_cards.name_en_us: Test Modal Return To Hand Or Draw Two

test_cards.rules_text_en_us: Give an allied character {anchored} until end of turn.
